title: Font Advice
content:
Hello,

I need some help with some font suggestions. I'm working on a logo for a highend ceramics gallery and would love some typeface suggestions. I tried a few classics but nothing seemed to be working. Trying find the right font that suggest artistic elegant and creative......

I'd love any help!

thanks,  
kay
author: kay

comments.content:
' [Dalliance](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023113612/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=87)', _by Frank Heine / Emigre, maybe_.?  
_Or_ ' [Bodoni Classic Chancery](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023113612/http:/www.wiescher-design.de/BodoniClassic-2.htm)', _by Gert Wiescher_.?
Why not investigate the beautiful Mercury Display (used as the Display font for Typophile)
Kay, can you show us the logo so far?
